mapper.select: SELECT do_no, do_title, do_content, do_yoyak, do_realimg, do_realimg_addr FROM dogam ORDER BY do_no
SELECT d.do_no, d.do_title, l.do_lev, l.do_img_addr FROM dogam d, lv_dogam l WHERE d.do_no=l.do_no AND l.do_lev=3;

SELECT distinct mb.id, d.do_no, d.do_title, d.do_content, d.do_realimg_addr, a.img1, b.img2, c.img3, m.do_name, m.do_exp, m.do_choice_YN, (SELECT p.level_no from point_level p, mem_dogam m WHERE m.do_exp >= p.lev_mim_point AND m.do_exp<=p.lev_max_point AND m.do_no=${do_no} AND m.id='${id}') as nowLv, (SELECT do_img_addr from lv_dogam WHERE do_lev=nowLv AND do_no=${do_no}) as lv_img, (SELECT distinct lev_max_point FROM point_level WHERE level_no= nowLv) as lev_max_point FROM dogam d, lv_dogam l, mem_dogam m, member mb, (SELECT distinct l.do_img_addr AS img1 FROM lv_dogam l, mem_dogam m, member mb WHERE l.do_no=m.do_no AND m.id=mb.id AND l.do_lev = 1 AND l.do_no=${do_no}) a, (SELECT distinct l.do_img_addr AS img2 FROM lv_dogam l, mem_dogam m, member mb WHERE l.do_no=m.do_no AND m.id=mb.id AND l.do_lev = 2 AND l.do_no=${do_no}) b, (SELECT distinct l.do_img_addr AS img3 FROM lv_dogam l, mem_dogam m, member mb WHERE l.do_no=m.do_no AND m.id=mb.id AND l.do_lev = 3 AND l.do_no=${do_no}) c WHERE d.do_no=l.do_no AND l.do_no=m.do_no AND m.id=mb.id AND mb.id='${id}' AND m.do_no=${do_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dogam (do_title, do_yoyak, do_content, do_realimg, do_realimg_addr) VALUES (#{do_title}, #{do_yoyak}, #{do_content}, #{do_realimg}, #{do_realimg_addr})
INSERT INTO lv_dogam (do_no, do_lev , do_img, do_img_addr) values (#{do_no}, #{do_lev} , #{do_img}, #{do_img_addr})
insert into mem_dogam(do_no, id) select #{do_no},#{userId} from dual WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT do_no FROM mem_dogam WHERE do_no=#{do_no} AND id=#{userId});
mapper.update: UPDATE mem_dogam SET do_choice_YN='N' WHERE id=#{userId} and do_choice_YN='Y'
UPDATE mem_dogam SET do_choice_YN='N' WHERE id=#{id} and do_exp=3000
mapper.select: SELECT do_no from mem_dogam where id=#{userId} AND do_choice_YN = 'Y';
mapper.update: update mem_dogam set do_choice_YN='N', do_name='${do_name}' WHERE id='${userId}' and do_no=${do_no} and do_exp=3000
UPDATE mem_dogam SET do_exp = do_exp + #{don_point} WHERE id=#{id} AND do_choice_YN='Y'
